website_summaries.verdict: A traditional pair of slippers for use around the spa that will keep the feet comfortable.
pros: A good amount of grip on the soles of the slippers prevents slips
Comes in a variety of sizes
Fabric material is comfortable for long periods of time
Can be worn inside or outside
cons: The slippers lack arch and heel support for good ergonomics

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good fit but don't last long
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes at first. They're super comfortable and fit great. However, after about a week of wearing them they've started coming apart (see pic). I only wear them around the house...really surprised and disappointed that they're falling apart already.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: attached picture says it all
customer_reviews.text: This picture should say it all! That was taken 30 days in. Rating it as 2 stars as they are very comfortable and durable. I tried to wash them and it made the 'feet marks' even darker. I can't recommend - or get them in black!
customer_reviews.author: bookkook

customer_reviews.title: WHAT's HAPPENED TO ACORN?
customer_reviews.text: My sisters and I have been wearing these Acorn spa thong slippers for years. Loved them. BUT in the past 2 years or so, the quality has gone way downhill. They fit badly. I wear a 6.5-7.5 Medium and the thong is sewn so low down that my heels slip off the back of the slipper. The material is ratty looking too. But I could live with that if they fit properly. Am returning my latest pair. I threw out previous 2 pairs that had same problem. Too lazy then to return but not this time. Sick of paying a lot of money for really shabby quality.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiana Carr

customer_reviews.title: You'll NEVER want to wear anything Else!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of pink Uggs & Emu's... BY FAR, these are the best!!!! I am a petite woman with somewhat wide toe area and these do not squeeze my toes and they are incredibly comfortable!!! My husband wanted me to get Uggs for Christmas, and I ended up getting these, NO REGRETS :D
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy Return Policy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful slippers, wonderful customer service! These slippers are super comfortable and wear well. I have a pair that I have been wearing for two years, and my son has a pair of the Men's Spa Slipper. Bought this pair for my young daughter, who wears a size 8,shoe. I ordered a Medium, bu it was too small for her. I requested an exchange for a size Large in black, instead of the blue. They immediately sent out the exchange. The black slippers were slightly more money, so they only charged me the $4.00 difference, wile awaiting my return.Very easy exchange!! The black does fit a little large, but she has no problem wearing them and now has room for growth.
customer_reviews.author: G777

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality as past years!
customer_reviews.text: Over the past decade, I've purchased these Acorn Spa Thongs slippers in at least four colors, often having 3 or 4 of the different colors at the same time. In the past, I've found them to be long wearing, washable and quite comfy, readily conforming to a person's individual foot. Well...these latest Spa Thongs slippers, in black, shed, have strings of both thread and pile that escape along the seams, are squishy feeling rather than conforming and, are just not at all the quality of Acorn of "old". I'm really disappointed, as I like for a product to be reliable, and to go back to it, anticipating and receiving the same quality. NOT this Spa Thong slipper anymore, unfortunately!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not made like they used to
customer_reviews.text: Bought my 4th pair of these (I buy one about every year because I wear them every day in the house during warmer weather). This is the first time I've had a problem. The first pair I got this year ripped at several seams within the first week. They were easy to exchange and I got my 2nd pair this year. They left black fuzz all over my house, and still do sometimes. It's annoying. Maybe they changed manufacturers because they aren't as good as they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Eflo

customer_reviews.title: Terribly uncomfortable toe-thong despite nicely cushioned footpad
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews have stated, the footpad is nicely cushioned, but the toe-thong is very uncomfortable. I bought a 1/2 size larger, but even then to make it fit, you have to jam your foot deep into it, and therefore into that unpadded thong. If they padded the toe-thong, they'd be comfortable, but they don't and it isn't. In fact, they're uncomfortable to wear and to walk in. Never buying Acorn brand again. Their designer should have noted this flaw. And it could be such a simple fix. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: MKATL

customer_reviews.title: Usual Acorn style and quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are my warm/hot weather slippers and I suspect they will last as long as my other Acorn slippers. I wear them often and hard which is why I need a new pair every other year (I throw them in the washer as often as I think necessary). The seams are what usually start to go first; but, for the price and wear I get for those couple of years, it's fine. These, with their blue/white stripe design, are simple and comfortable (though they don't have an arch, if you believe that to be necessary for comfort.) They are new, but if they fail sooner than expected, I will update review.
customer_reviews.author: PithyWoman

customer_reviews.title: Improve the stitches
customer_reviews.text: On the 2nd day I wore it, i noticed a color white. When I take a closer look, the cover was opening already. I hope you can improve the stitches.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Quality has declined
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Acorn thong slippers for years, but they just don’t seem to be the same quality as before. After about two weeks the fabric by the thong started becoming worn and bare. This was the second pair the quality just wasn’t there. Very disappointing because in the past they have been my feet’s saving grace to wear around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for and more! Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I just received them, so I cant testify to how well they last...but they seem very well made. So far, I'm in love and will be buying another color as well as looking at what else these guys carry. When I first saw them i was surprised at how thick the soles looked and i thought i would hate them. They're SO comfy-thick i can't really describe it. You sink into them but they still offer support, and they feel like memory foam, but better. Hard to describe these...I say just buy them!
customer_reviews.author: PrettyLights

customer_reviews.title: VERY Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My second pair. I have them in gray. FYI LOBSTER RED is actually CORAL, but very pretty! Love them! UPDATE: Unfortunately after wearing them less than 2 weeks around my home, they began coming apart. I have had my gray pair (same style) 2 years with not one thread loose. Sadly, must return.
customer_reviews.author: 1feedback

customer_reviews.title: Slippery and Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are horrible - I had to throw mine away. They're a bit high, which would not be a bad thing under normal circumstances, but your foot slips and slides so badly that I was afraid to wear them for fear I would twist an ankle, or worse, trip and fall. I bought them to use only as something to put on when out of the shower until getting dressed, and didn't feel safe wearing them for even that limited amount of time. They felt comfortable to stand in, but that was it. I would strongly advise against buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Xjgxlxigxh

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but....
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, nice cushion and the sizing seems accurate. However, there are a couple of problems for me with the part that goes between the toes: (1) There is heavy stitching that is irritating to the skin between the toes. I'm a long time flip flop/thong wearer, so it's not just that I'm new to thongs. (2) The placement of the part that goes between the toes is off on the right slipper. It's a quarter inch closer to center than it is on the left slipper. Just that little bit forces the ball and toes of my foot to be noticeably off center (too far right). I probably should have returned for another pair but was too lazy.
customer_reviews.author: C-Louise

customer_reviews.title: Good, If You Have Time to Break Them In
customer_reviews.text: These slippers definitely require some breaking in. They are VERY tight under the strap until they get compressed with use. I wear a 7.5 shoe and originally purchased the next smaller size but my toes and heels were right at the ends. This bigger size fits better, a little extra space at my toes and heels but not so much that I get tripped up. Still working on wearing them enough to totally break them in. They are getting more and more comfortable as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Staci S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Biuy! = Sheds pile everywhere and it doesn't get any better!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed with these slippers! They shed black pile everywhere! I had hopes it would die down after a few weeks, however, I continue to leave a trail of black pile throughout the house. I had thought Acorn was a good slipper manufacturer, but no one wants to constantly pick up a trail of black fuzz everywhere! Really disappointed with these slippers and with Acorn! Update: slippers never stopped leaving a trail of pile everywhere! I am throwing them out and never buying another pair of Acorn slippers in my life!
customer_reviews.author: K. Cordato

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on a cloud❣️
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable slippers I’ve ever worn. I just measured my foot. It measures 10” long. I purchased size 11 slippers. They are 1/2” too big, but since I prefer larger than smaller, I’m keeping them as they are super comfy. FYI: my normal shoe size is 10.5 which are very hard to find, so I always go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Hepburn

customer_reviews.title: great price; seems like they designed it a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Been getting these for years; arrived quickly, great price; seems like they designed it a little different; footbed not as pillowy, however, I feel it gives me more stability; it is still really comfy; also, it runs about an inch shorter, taken off the top, so that's ok, too, as the top always had extra room ( a lot); so, there are changes, but I think they're good changes; these usually last about a year anyway - stopped washing, breaks down faster Update 8/4: Came apart at the seam, had to exchange; Amazon makes process easy; Will update again when I get new pair; this is the first time this has ever happened, been getting these for about 7 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: goddess

customer_reviews.title: Walking on Clouds Again 👍☁️👍
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought 2 pairs of these at Costco probably 10 years ago. They have been perfect for my feet. Recently one pair completely broke down in the sole for me & I had to toss them out. I am thrilled to find them still available through Amazon 😁. I just received my new pair today & they fit like a dream!! I truly hope they will hold up well like my initial ones! I'm a little concerned after reading reviews here. I'll revisit my review after I've worn them a bit. For now, it's like walking in the clouds!! ☁️☁️
customer_reviews.author: Carol in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The material keep a shedding and leaving pieces of fuzz everywhere and the inner sole is already torn and broken down and i've only had them a month.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Problem with sizing
customer_reviews.text: I have four pairs of Acorn slippers. I was excited to get these because they looked so comfortable. I couldn't even get my foot in them. The thong was set too far back so the back of my foot was hanging over the back of the slipper. Very tight fitting, it was a struggle to just get my foot under the strap. I had the return authorization filled out within 30 minutes of receiving them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara and Paul

customer_reviews.title: Don't plan on having these for long
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Gives good support not often provided by bedroom slippers. Comfy. CONS: Does not last. I am on to my third pair in 2 years. They are going to come apart at some point and this last pair , which i got in black, cannot stop shedding! It is terrible. I frighten myself each time I see clumps of black fur on the floor and think I a looking at a weird insect. I just had to literally trim my current pair as if I were grooming a poodle.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Nevins

customer_reviews.title: Great support, improved quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Acorns, and I find that each pair I get is not as good as the one before. First, these are the best memory foam slippers I have ever had, comfort wise. The foam will not smash down and my legs love the support. However, with each new pair I have purchased, the toe separator has been of poorer and poorer quality. I bought this last pair a couple of weeks ago and the toe separator is already tearing. I love the feel of them, but can't afford to replace them as often as I have had to do so. Update: Fourth pair and the toe separators seem more more sturdy. Love my Acorns.
customer_reviews.author: K.McBride

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.  Almost.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these slippers, overall. Cute. Stylish. No irritation around my toes. But someone thought it would be a good idea, I suppose, to EMBROIDER a logo on the heel of the things. I feel it as soon as I put them on. That wasn't a good idea. $30 to walk around the house...I need to feel nothing but warm and fuzzies.
customer_reviews.author: E. Savage Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzzzzz
customer_reviews.text: There is fuzz everywhere on these. I have been ordering these for years and now the newer ones fuzz up and get all over everything. Comes off on your feet and gets all over everything your feet touch, when laying on couch or when you put your feet under the covers of your bed after removing shoes. I USED to LOVE these and now this will be my last order. The sole is not as supportive as it once was either I've noticed on my last two orders as well as the fuzzing on both orders, one current and the other end of 2018. Update 11/2019: after several washings, fuzz is still coming off of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected. same! size as my old ones. These are bigger!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Acorn thongs, I bought awhile back in plaid. They are fine. Decided to get antoher pair recently. I was surprised to see these are larger then the previous pair. Both made in the same place. Not pleased. I'm keeping them, anyway. Maybe this summer my feet will swell a bit since I live in a hot climate, Florida. Plus I'm tired of sending things back I buy that are not what they are suppose to be. I wish they were made here instead.
customer_reviews.author: Fred L. Tona Marie Tona

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and nice and spongy when walking!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these slippers. I wear a lot of Birkenstocks that have the split for the large toe so these are perfect. I also wear compression stockings (from base of toes to just below the knee) so these are just perfect. Once I find my size I will check through all of the colors because the prices are different for the colors. I buy 2 pair at a time for about $25 each so there is a big savings if you shop colors. Perfect fit, they are kind of spongy when you walk. shop your size and then shop the colors to get the best $$ Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Joan L. Mckeon

customer_reviews.title: Sizing and shape can be off
customer_reviews.text: I listened to the reviewers and ordered the size larger than my normal size of 7 1/2, but the pair I received was huge. I couldn't fathom why others felt they were small. I don't know if these are all from a bad batch and everyone is getting different sizes or what. When I replaced them with my normal size, they were still too long and largely shaped around the toe. I've kept them because they are cute and I loved the ragg concept, but they are unlike my other Acorns, the quality and sizing about which I usually brag.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: I chose these because they seemed like UGGs but I will just have to splurge on ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very soft and fuzzy as the picture shows, it is a little stiff but I would not repurchase. I chose these because they seemed like UGGs but I will just have to splurge on the higher end. These are not very spa like. Would not repurchase or recommend. I don't see these lasting too long as well. I have a new puppy and she doesn't seem to like these shoes, because she pees on them.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but not as comfortable or durable as they should be for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Love the material and the color! A little tight across the top of my foot though. After wearing them a few times the material started to rip on the side of one. I expected them to be more comfortable and last longer, they were very expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but much too tight and overpriced; returned
customer_reviews.text: The fleece on these is very soft but very pilly looking, much nicer in the picture than reality. They are also ridiculously tight; I could barely get them onto my very narrow feet. Also, I don't know if it is a poor design or just a bad lot or bad luck, but two different pairs had a misshapen left slipper. Not worth half the cost, let alone $40.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the sizing weren't so weird on these. I'm usually a size 7.5 and so I ordered a medium. They're slightly small but the next size will be way too big. They are soft and smooshy but not supportive like other more expensive slippers I've had like spenco. No arch support and a little slippery, sometimes my foot just slips right off. I am keeping them and will just use as a back up slipper.
customer_reviews.author: jessica krueger

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product at a high end shoe store and loved it. Second pair from Amazon was decent quality
customer_reviews.text: First, I purchased this product at a high end shoe store and loved it. Second pair from Amazon was decent quality. Last pair fell apart in less than four months. My current pair, I have had less than I month and it’t sepersting at the seams, strings of fabric hanging off the sides-horrible quality. This can’t possible be a product from Acorn- gotta be a knock-off!
customer_reviews.author: carol saunders

customer_reviews.title: Quality in the Material
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second pair of these great slippers. My first pair has not worn out, I just didn't wash them often enough to remove all the ground in soil from my feet; and so they were getting a little bit embarrassing. The materials of the insole and midsole of my first pair has not worn out so the slippers are still as comfortable as the new pair. I also very much like that the soles are a no slip rubber so I can step outside with them on
customer_reviews.author: JanzieP

customer_reviews.title: Slide right off my feet
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how these have so many raving reviews! I ordered the Azalea color in a size Large/8-9 for my size 8 foot. The length fit perfectly BUT as I walk, they just start to slide right off my feet! I wear flip flops a lot and I know flip flops are not supposed to do that. Very annoying and I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: WRPmom52716

customer_reviews.title: runs large!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 6.5 in every style of shoe. since these don't come in exact sizes (instead you have to do a 5-6 or a 6.5-7) I order the 6.5-7. I had an inch at the front and inch in the back. way too large. I re-ordered in the 5-6 so we will see if those fit or are way too small. fingers crossed. they did seem a bit stiff in the footbed as well. I'm hoping since they have so many good reviews that the footbed softens with use.
customer_reviews.author: jlt

customer_reviews.title: Ahh -- Acorn Slippers
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased numerous pairs of these spa slippers over the years. They last three to four years before I wear them out. They are so comfortable for around the house and have a nice sole if one needs to go outside. Very cushy. I have a bit of a wider foot and a wide size was sold out. Tried the regular width and was initially a bit tight, but with a little wear they stretched and fit perfectly. I highly recommend these. Your feet will go ahhh when you slip them on.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Pepper

customer_reviews.title: These use to be the best slippers! Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th pair over many years. These use to be the best slippers! Unfortunately, this pair and the last pair I bought both split at the seam near the heal within a couple of days. It seems the quality is not the same anymore and this is the last pair that I will buy. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! Bought these on April 15, 2017 & by August 15 they are unwearable. The fabric is tearing away from the foam insole & the toe thong broke away entirely. I'm surprised because I have worn several pairs of these over the years & really liked them! In the past I've replaced them after a year or so. I definitely expected these to last longer than 4 months. Gave 2 stars instead of 1 star because they were very comfortable & maybe this was just a shoddily made pair.
customer_reviews.author: chbloom

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these for years but will never buy them again! The last time I bought them they didnt last very long and were not as comfortable as they used to be, I thought it was a just a one time thing, but nooo, the last ones I bought only lasted 1 month before they started to fall apart and were not comfortable...save your money and buy another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Zombie Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer slipper!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable. Perfect summer slipper. We keep the house warm in the summer, so my feet were sweating in my normal slippers. I had resorted to wearing flip flops around the house and thought... There must be a better solution. Enter the Acorn Spa Thong. They exceeded my expectations and feel like I'm walking on clouds. I wear an 8.5 and the size 8-9 worked perfectly. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: CSF

customer_reviews.title: ... these after reading the reviews but I an extremely disappointed. After only wearing these for 5 days they ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these after reading the reviews but I an extremely disappointed. After only wearing these for 5 days they ripped. I wasn't wearing them non-stop but had them on when in the house. I wouldn't recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Won't stop shedding black!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this slipper for some time and loved. But the recent purchase of a black pair have been unusable! They constantly shed! The bottom of my feet are coated with black lint after only a short wear. I have tried washing in cold and letting air dry. As well as using a lint roller--repeated sheets trying to get all the black lint off. But it keeps coming. And I notice the fabric is more slick and I slide a bit when I walk. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: DallasJulie

customer_reviews.title: Cute summer slippers are super comfy, too!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the 4th or 5th pair of these Acorn "flip flop"-style slippers I have owned over a number of years (still wearing at least 3 of them). They are excellent as summer house shoes, but the rubber sole allows them to be worn out on the patio and into the yard, too! SO comfy with the memory foam foot bed, and much more stylish than just wearing regular slippers around the house. I slip into them every chance I get. And these are so cute, too!
customer_reviews.author: Peter  & Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare Thongs
customer_reviews.text: What trash. The black sheds constantly. After a month and laundering, my house is still covered with balls of slimy black fuzz. Not to worry though— the soles are already showing bare spots so they’ll be in the trash tomorrow. Really, Acorn??????
customer_reviews.author: Lucy m

customer_reviews.title: soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a Morton's Neuroma in my left foot (pinched nerve between 3rd and 4th toe) and it hurts to walk without any support. I bought these as my summer house slippers (I have house shoes for winter). I have all wood floors in my house it is very painful to walk without any support but I didn't want to wear the house shoes because my feet got too hot. These are great and provide the right amount of support. When they start looking grungy, I just throw them in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Misha011

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable but they don't last more than a month or two. I returned my first pair because they broke after about 3 weeks, luckily still within the return window. Second pair lasted just over month. I wore both pairs strictly inside on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Slipper? Can't Slip Foot In Without Shoehorn!
customer_reviews.text: Disppointed in the 9B Acorn Spa Thong Slipper. The thong upper part is too snug on the medium, which is my normal shoe. I'd have bought the wide C size but it's $10 more for it. There's no reason for the B medium to be this snug. The thong also connects too low in the shoe so that the heel is at the edge, but you stil have an inch of toes, which is like clown shoes. I would love to return them but I need the cushiony sole because I hurt my ankle and also don't want to pay almost 50% more for a wide. The sole is non-slip and well cushioned which is super.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, wearing down after a month... not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact same pair (same brand) from zappos a few years ago and they lasted me 1.5 years. They went on sale here on amazon for prime day so I bought another pair because I loved them so much. The quality is not even comparable. This new pair will probably last me a few more months, if that. The fabric feels cheap and piles off into bunches that I have to peel off and throw away. Feels so cheap, I’m really disappointed. I loved loved loved my first pair so much- what happened to the quality?!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Y

customer_reviews.title: Bought again and again
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers, buy a new pair every year as I don't take them off all winter. They are warm without heating up my feet, good arch support and traction. They wash up great, as my dog often slobbers on them. Best slipper out there, I tried other less expensive and these are worth every cent. This is my third year and third pair. Note: they were well, but. I wear them to death.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia DiGiovanni

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but last forever
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these slippers that I loved and wore all the time. Eventually they started wearing out so I went on the hunt for a new pair. I bought one and was disappointed. I finally went through my Amazon purchase history to see if I could get the same ones. I saw the price and thought that was way too much for slippers... but then I realized I had bought them 5 years ago! I decided that was worth the cost. I hope they are still available in 5 years when the ones I just bought wear out. :)
customer_reviews.author: ZAPSMOM

customer_reviews.title: They seem like fakes.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the acorn slippers for a couple years and loved them. The last 2 pairs I purchased looked exactly the same as all others, however, the minute I started to wear them, the began to deteriorate and were unwearable. It felt like they were fake. Cannot buy from this buyer again.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki

customer_reviews.title: great comfortable slipper.  Runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: Update: I did call Acorn and they told me they have not changed their product at all and to contact Amazon about this seller Fashion footware. I did order another pair from acorn directly. Even the soles are different. Don't buy from Fasion Footware. I have to say after wearing this particular pair from this seller, for a while, i noticed that the are less padded than prior pairs of Acorn spa slippers. I wonder if Acorn has changed the way they are made. This pair is very stiff, seems smaller and has significantly less padding so I'm ordered from another supplier and their product was much better. Much different. This ones going back.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Scarlett0

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SPA SLIPPER
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many of these spa slippers and love them. I wash and dry them when they need and get several years wear from them. I like to buy different colors and have several pairs at hand to use. My German Shepherd loves them as well - brings them to me in the morning and sometimes chews them up. I would recommend these to everyone. I love them,
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: 2nd order!
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers! They are my "go to" for around the house. They are very comfortable and I like that they are washable. I got the black size large and they are perfect for my 8 1/2- 9 sized feet,
customer_reviews.author: DOGLVR11

customer_reviews.title: beware of "free return" - not so!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the slipper. When I tried to put it on, I could not even get my foot into the slipper. I have very high arches, but it seemed that you need to have a very flat foot to be able to wear these comfortably. I returned immediately and was then disappointed again to receive just a little more than 1/2 of what I paid as a refund. The product description says "free return", but when I checked out more of the details they not only deducted from my refund a nominal fee to ship back, but also their original shipping costs AND a 20% restocking fee. The "free return" language is EXTREMELY misleading!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone downhill
customer_reviews.text: It's only been 3 weeks since I received these slippers and already the memory foam has flattened. I usually purchase these once a year as that's when they wear out for me. My feet ache because there's no support and they're no longer comfortable. They used to be such great slippers - comfortable, soft, and spongy. Will no longer be purchasing these in future.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great summer slippers
customer_reviews.text: Great summer slippers. Very soft and comfortable. The bed was a little slippery first, and my foot would slide off the side. Feels better now that I've been wearing them a while. The soles have a nice grip. Easy to clean in the washer and dryer. Not a ton of support for the arch but they do conform to your feet after a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and true to size. The reason for 3 stars is because they are made of a different material than the ones I bought a couple years ago. My feet slide around in these shoes a lot, especially if I have to walk outside in the yard for something. My previous slippers of this brand did not do that. They were great.
customer_reviews.author: Rgm52

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly padded
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. I asked for them every year for Christmas. I really love how comfortable and squishy they are they warm up my feet just enough but not so hot or sweaty like most slippers. I have a wood floors and my ankles and knees are too sensitive to walk barefoot these are the perfect indoor option. I do wish I could somehow wash them and bring the foot bed back to life. It does get matted down fairly quickly but the cushion stays.
customer_reviews.author: Atravels

customer_reviews.title: So comfy. Acorn is a brand that I trust for well made,comfortable slippers
customer_reviews.text: So comfy. Acorn is a brand that I trust for well made, comfortable slippers. My apartment can be warm in winter but the common areas are much cooler. These slippers are perfect for wearing in my apartment and for trips to the laundry room and mailroom. The cushy berber pile is very soft and luxurious and the sole is sturdy and non skid. They are a tiny bit long in the toe area but a size smaller would not have worked for me. The little extra length is not a problem and is probably a bit safer than if they were shorter. There are similar slippers at lower prices but they're not nearly as well made as these.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Gray

customer_reviews.title: Made wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these slippers before and had no problem. The left slipper on this pair was made wrong. The thong was attached too far back on the foot bed making the thong across the foot way too tight. Same old, same old. Everything has problems this day in age. Hard to find anything made right. The picture shows the 2 slippers lined up by the thong. The one on the right is correct. You can see in the picture how far off the left one is.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh McGill

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these thongs that have lasted less than 6 months. This brand used to last me years. I’m so disappointed in the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: CCTX

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting “house shoes,” I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: Great comfort/support and keep my feet warm. Washed them already and hung to dry. They washed and dried (quickly)perfectly. I don’t have to work to keep them on, and am not tripping needlessly. These thongs are really worth the money. I would buy them again and even buy them to gift another. I’m more hesitant to give 5 stars these days. When I read reviews I’m more apt to believe 4 stars rather then 5, so that’s why 4 stars only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper thongs!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and I love wearing them around the house or even out if necessary. They provide so much cushion for my feet to walk around on my hardwood/tile floors. My only complaint is that my foot slides off of them sometimes! I don't really know how you would remedy that. I wear a size 8 and I could have probably gone down a size as these are slightly big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My third pair!
customer_reviews.text: This brand of flip flop slipper replaced a perfect pair of Karen Neubergers which are no longer available. So far, I have found these to be somewhat comparable. "Somewhat" because with long wear, ( one year ) my first two pairs did start looking ratty BUT they are still intact. So, now I have a nice pair for home, the ratty pair to go into garage, and rattiest is reserved for the driveway. They are extremely comfortable and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: piscesfille

customer_reviews.title: Not Pleased with these Slippers
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Acorns through Nordstrom or direct from Acorn ---- these do not feel the same and the right toe divider hurts my toe. I'm wondering if they are seconds? Not pleased with these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these. I didn't like spending this much for slippers, but I needed something. The strap was just a little too tight. The sizing is a little odd, too - 6.5-7.5. If they had been 7-8, as in other slippers, I'm sure they would have been fine. I was pretty sure the next size up (8-9) was going to be too big, plus they were more money! So back they went.
customer_reviews.author: KatPhil

customer_reviews.title: Love these cozy slippers
customer_reviews.text: Acorn are the only slippers I wear. I have hard ceramic tile floors which kill my feet unless I wear slippers and these stand up well to daily use. The cushioned bed molds to your foot but still gives support. Other slippers I’ve tried seem to wear flat over time. I have one pair for winter and one (terry cloth) for summer. I recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Girl

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god. $40 for bedroom slippers? You bet. Worth Every Cent. I CANNOT WAIT to put these babies on at the end of the day. Even walking to the mailbox makes me proud because they make my feet look super cute. I've washed them maybe twice in 2 months because I don't want to wear them out. The Acorn brand is exceptional, but I treat these like gold, nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: BrahmsyLove

customer_reviews.title: Great summer slippers!
customer_reviews.text: This my second pair of ACORN slippers. I pretty much live in these in the summer so the fact the last pair made three years, with repeated washings, says something. They are a little tight across the top at first, but after a few days, they fit great. I like that they add some support so if I am cooking/standing for long periods, my feet are not bothered. I usually wear a 6 1/2 and I ordered the M (6.5-7.5) and while they are a little long, they don't cause me any issues while walking. I do think the S would have been too small.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: I am beyond disappointed in these slippers
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond disappointed in these slippers. I had a pair that lasted me 6 years so now that it was time to replace them, I figured I would put out the money because I know they last. The first pair I ordered, I returned because they came ripped. The replacement pair that came looked fine, but after wearing them for 3 days has now ripped. The quality on these slippers has absolutely gone down the drain. Don't buy them, they're not worth the money. I wish I hadn't wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: The Acorn Women's Spa Thong slippers are defective. I used to wear them a lot, and bought a new pair at a local shop. After a few days I noticed the Right slipper was unfinished (the actual thong piece), but I'd already worn them and felt weird about returning them. Thinking I just got a bad pair, I ordered a new pair on Amazon - same defect! Didn't even open the package, as I could see they had the same problem. I contacted customercare@acorn.com and was told to send pictures! Sorry. No, I returned the 2nd pair to Amazon and am wearing the original pair for now. Acorn - NOT Amazon - lost a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Zelmo

customer_reviews.title: Love this slipper but got a lemon this time
customer_reviews.text: I love this slipper! This is the fourth pair I have bought. They are super comfy and great for warm weather. They are also washable. This last pair was the first time I have had a complaint. I ordered it in black this time. They have been shedding fuzz ever since I got them 2 months ago. I thought it might be temporary, but not the case. Also, I notice there is a hole in one of them already. I do wear them every day, but they usually last me 1-2 years, not 2 months. Bottom line, I would recommend this slipper. Just know that you could get a bad pair.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: just too big, makes me clumsy
customer_reviews.text: I realized they were somewhat large when I first tried them on but decided to try to make them do. However in a few days, they have stretched become ill-fitting and too floppy making me stumble, so I really can't use them. Too bad since I like the way the top part is cut and I'm very fond of the Acorn slippers (I've had several pair or different kinds).
customer_reviews.author: L. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair, 1st was store bought several years ago. They hold pretty good over the years, very comfortable, except do not buy white or any light color. I had white, and in the end they looked like crap. Like other reviewers wrote impossible to wash off dark stains. Sizewise buy your true size, I am wearing 9-9.5, bought 8-9 and 9.5-10 to compare. 8-9 size fits just right, 9.5-10 are too big. I have narrow feet but they are quit tight, hope will stretch a little. Next time will try 8-9 wide. In my opinion they are priced a little bit too high, around $20 would be the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Gudakova

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of pairs of Reef brand slippers like this that I completely wore out. Reef no longer makes them and I have searched high and low for some similar. Have tried other brands and been disappointed. This is the closest thing to Reef slippers. Amazing. A little tight at first but wear in nicely. Love them
customer_reviews.author: S King Fan

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these and this is my third pair over the years. They are 100% cotton and have hard support at the bottom. They are super cushioned with what seems like cotton and are washable. I can't wear anything else because it just feels so che a's p in comparison to these. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: MR22AZ

customer_reviews.title: Poor fabric
customer_reviews.text: Cushy, yes, but fabric stained immediately and with everything it touches. Not fabric feels slimy. Only a couple months old terrible
customer_reviews.author: MmeLouin

customer_reviews.title: These slippers are soft, comfortable and have great support.
customer_reviews.text: These have become my favorite house slippers. Very comfortable and I love the color selection. I have no complaints and simply love them.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Vee

customer_reviews.title: Holes within six months
customer_reviews.text: These are SO COMFY.... but I got holes in both of them after about six months of wear. I only wear these in my home when I wake up for about an hour in the morning. Quality isn’t there for this price point. I had a pair of Acorn slip on slippers that lasted me for about 8 years though. Not sure what happened with this style.
customer_reviews.author: M. Czerwiec

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: These could have been great but the part that goes between your toes was too far back so that there was way too much room in the toes and not enough in the heel. It needed to move forward about an inch, then they would have been comfortable. As is, it put too much pressure between the toes and made them fit weird. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Comfy for My Feet
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Acorn Spa Slippers, but the first pair I bought on Amazon, I should have checked here first because Amazon had the lowest price, I really don't care about the color, especially if the price is 50% less than elsewhere! These are the best slippers, they are very comfortable, I put them on the minute I walk in the door, I wear them all the time just because they are just so comfortable and supportive. They wash very well, and I wash mine a lot! These are the only slippers I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQNC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable support in a thong slipper!
customer_reviews.text: These terry slippers are so comfortable! I wanted a soft thong-style slipper, but several reviews stated those made of other "fuzzy" material had shed. I chose this terry material slipper and so far am very pleased - no shedding at all. I wear an 8-1/2 Narrow and reviews also stated that these ran a little small, so I ordered size 9 - 10. The length is a little long but the width is perfect. I would say they run narrow but true to length. They are sturdy enough to provide some support, unlike many slippers that have a very thin sole. I haven't tried cleaning them, though the tag says they can be machine-washed. Would definitely purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: spry old girl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this style.
customer_reviews.text: This style is so poorly made. After just several weeks wearing them inside the material on the foot bed has holes in it. I wear ONLY Acorn slip ons that hold up for years. Something went wrong with this style. They are far below the standard I know Acorn is known for. Mine look exactly like the pictures in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: ohionurse

customer_reviews.title: Messy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these slippers last year and they were so nice and comfortable I purchased a new pair this year. I'm not sure what changed but this pair is shedding all over my house! I thought it would stop after I broke them in but they are still shedding large black bits of fuzz everywhere! What a mess. Comfortable but not worth the money or mess.
customer_reviews.author: Peejay

customer_reviews.title: Squid Ink is Not Gray
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering gray slippers, as they looked gray to me in the photo. However, they are purple, not gray. Still, I won't wear anything other than Acorn slippers, so I'll deal with the purple. I always try to keep at least three pairs of these slippers on hand, because when I'm home, I wear them around the clock. They are that comfortable! If you haven't ever worn Acorn slippers, you need to try them. They are absolutely the best!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!  But...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Acorn bedroom slippers. This black set are heavenly to wear. I cannot walk around barefoot, as my feet always hurt. HOWEVER, the right slipper is already falling apart. I’ve never had this happen before. Definitely a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sniggih

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother with any other brand
customer_reviews.text: Acorn hands down is the best for slippers. I’m on my 3rd pair. The first two lasted for many years. I recently tried another brand to save a buck and they came apart after a few months of use. Acorn is very high quality and comfortable. They do but a bit large. I’m an 8.5 show size but I fit fine in their smallest size that’s advertised as 6-7.
customer_reviews.author: Pineapple shack

customer_reviews.title: The best flip flop slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these flip flop slippers! I tried a few others here on Amazon and these are my #1 pick. They give the perfect balance of warmth and coolness. Very cushy at the beginning but they break in nicely. I also have wider feet and they work very well for me. Also easy to pack for trips.
customer_reviews.author: Annenai

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: really comfy and fits as expected but very poor quality. within 2 weeks of wearing it, the piece between the toes ripped off and the seam attaching it to the sole is tearing
customer_reviews.author: Aruna Seetahal-Mouttet

customer_reviews.title: COMFY
customer_reviews.text: Mine lasted 2-1/2 years before I ordered another pair but I really wore them out! I have black slippers and I wash my feet at end of day before I wear each time so "imprints" don't show. Super comfy I never had any problems with them splitting. I washed in a net bag in washing machine with other gentle items and air dried on top of drier. Love. They are a little pricey for slippers.
customer_reviews.author: wyotx

customer_reviews.title: My favorite house slippers!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite house slippers!! They are sooooo comfortable. I've purchased them before. years ago. I love all the new color choices. They also seem to help keep your skin stay smooth--so less chance of dry skin, calluses or cracked heel.
customer_reviews.author: Rose M

customer_reviews.title: Best Slipper
customer_reviews.text: I love the acorn slippers they have great support. I need support in my feet because my veins make my feet hurt. Other slipper I have tried but they do not have support after an hour or so my feet are hurting really bad. These slipper I can wear them around the house for hours and my feet and legs don't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: awesome slipper
customer_reviews.text: I have these slippers in several colors. live in south Florida so wear year round. have flat narrow feet & the comfort is wonderful. wear large, & wear size 9 in other shoes. love the fact that the bottom of the slipper is made well enough to wear outside as needed. also washes well on delicate cycle. dry flat.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Love this slipper!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this brand slipper. Since Covid19 hit, all I do is wear slippers. My first pair finally gave out after 2 years. This new pair is fabulous. Very soft material, sole is memory foam and super comfortable. My feet do get a little warm in them - even though they are a flip flop style. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: txChris

customer_reviews.title: Barefoot on hardwood floors no more!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a pair of comfy slippers for a while. I work from home and I usually run around on hard wood floors all day when not at my desk. I'm also a runner and have noticed as I have aged it's been tougher on my feet to be barefoot on wood floors. I am so very happy with these so far and hope to stay in the habit of slipping them on when I leave my desk..I highly recommend to all! One note, I did have to break them in a little, they were tight around the thong area but that didn't take long.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewing for you

customer_reviews.title: BEST Slippers EVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Acorns because they are VERY comfortable but also supportive!! I wear slippers all the time in the house.... so I have like.. 5 pairs of ACORNS plus a variety of others. The ACORNS are very well made, so they last. AND they wash well. I just wish they were'nt quite so pricey but, its worth it for the quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claire-San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Slippers Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Got new carpet, and wanted to make sure it stays clean, so no shoes in the house - slippers instead. Of course, it is my first day wearing them, but they are so much cushier than any of the other slippers I have purchased for wearing around the house, that i am thrilled. My legs don't ache standing on the wood floors, and because it is a thing type, I have no worries of getting a fungal infection because my feet are enclosed all day. No-slip bottom is good too. Will try them for two weeks, and if I continue to love them and they prove durable, buy several more pair!
customer_reviews.author: jc

product_meta.title: Acorn Women's Spa Thong with Premium Memory Foam
product_meta.description: Make every day a spa day with the Acorn Women's Spa Thong. With plush spa terry uppers, the Spa Thong slipper pampers your feet in Cloud Contour memory foam technology with heel and arch support, whether your feet are relaxing or on the move. Indoors and outdoors, the skid-resistant, weatherproof sole ensures durability from house to spa to every après adventure.
feature_bullets: Classic spa slipper- Super soft plush terry spa house slipper in classic flip flop design for all-year wear comfort; Skid-resistant, weatherproof rugged sole provides indoor & outdoor versatility.

Memory foam + arch support- Soft multilayer cushion insole with quick-recovery memory foam foot bed for heel and arch support that cradles the contour of your foot. Durable rubber with anti-skid texture on the bottom gives you safe and secure footing.

Slip on comfort- Open toe style with comfortable and breathable support that surrounds your feet and toes in cloud like comfort; Marshmallow-like cushion for tired toes and heels, helps reduce muscle fatigue and relieves pain and pressure.
Versatile- All season flip flop slipper with skid-resistant, durable and lightweight sole. Easily portable; great for spa, Yoga, gym, home, office, school, hospital, travel, indoors, outdoor.

Sizing and Care- Memory foam will conform to your foot with each use. Small (5-6), Medium (6.5-7.5), Large (8-9), X-Large (9.5-10.5). Available in XX-Large (11-12) in Black, Grey, Natural, Taupe, Periwinkle, and Turq. Available in wide widths in Black and Natural in S, M, L, XL. Easy care: Machine wash and dry.
